SUMMARY:  On October 26, 2018 at 2:00 P.M., Rachael Koss and Miles Maurino, representing Coalition of California Utility Employees met with David Gamson, Adenike Adeyeye and Maria Sotero, advisors to Cmmr. Guzman Aceves, in San Francisco. Ms. Koss and Mr. Maurino explained the relationship between the above referenced proceeding and A.17-10-007 and A.17-10-008. Specifically, Ms. Koss and Mr. Maurino provided a brief history of Southern California Gas Company’s reconnection policy, and explained that, while any changes in reconnection policy will be addressed in R.18-07-005, funding for adequate staffing levels to ensure that timely reconnections and other essential customer services are carried out, must occur in the current Sempra General Rate Case.
